Vue USWDS (United States Web Design System) integration for Nuxt.js
Easy U.S. Web Design System (USWDS) integration for Nuxt.js.
dependency to your project. You will also need to install
as it is a peer dependency.

# Using npm
npm install nuxt-uswds vue-uswds

# Using pnpm
pnpm add nuxt-uswds vue-uswds

# Using yarn
yarn add nuxt-uswds vue-uswds
That's it! You can now use all Vue USWDS components in your Nuxt app ✨
The module supports the following options. They can be added to your
Enabled Nuxt's auto-import of all Vue USWDS base components. You should only need to turn disable this option if you have a name conflict with Vue USWDS's
Enabled Nuxt's auto-import of all regular Vue USWDS components.
If you have a name conflict with Nuxt.js's auto importing of Vue USWDS's
internal components, you can set an additional prefix with this option.
. This should prevent any name conflicts with Nuxt.js's auto importing of components. If you encounter an issues however, you can add an additional prefix with this option.
options to want to use. The

# Install dependencies
npm install

# Generate type stubs
npm run dev:prepare

# Develop with the playground
npm run dev

# Build the playground
npm run dev:build

# Run ESLint
npm run lint

# Type check
npm run types

# Run Vitest
npm run test
npm run test:watch
